attributes.action: Give the British Armed Forces Abroard Postcodes - Home Town Postcode
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With increasing problems with most civilian companies not accepting British forces Postal Codes why not enable the Armed forces personnel to officially use their home town postcode?  Their local sorting office could receive the mail, and forward to  BFPO (which would be part of the address). This will inevitably delay mail but at least enable us to use all the companies that our civilian counterparts can.
